title: Feature: Payment Processing
body:
When users book an activity, the system must charge them through a mock payment gateway and record the payment outcome. Payment is implicit in POST /bookings; on gateway success, booking is created with payment status; on failure, HTTP 402 is returned and no booking is created.

**Specification**: [feat-payment-processing.spec.md](specs/feat-payment-processing.spec.md)

**Reference**: [PRD](/PRD.md) FR5, TR5.

## Implementation Plan

- **Specification**: [feat-payment-processing.spec.md](specs/feat-payment-processing.spec.md)
- **PRD**: [FR5 Payment Processing](PRD.md#fr5-payment-processing)
- **Branch**: feat/payment-processing

steps.title: Step 1: Payment type definitions
steps.description: Create TypeScript types for payment domain entity, status, and mock gateway contract.

tasks.title: Create src/types/payment.ts with PaymentStatus union and Payment interface
tasks.description: Define PaymentStatus as 'pending' | 'paid' | 'refunded'; Payment with id, bookingId, amount, status, createdAt

tasks.title: Define mock gateway adapter interface (e.g. charge(amount, context) => success/failure)
tasks.description: Abstract contract for mock gateway so implementation can be swapped or configured

steps.title: Step 2: Mock payment gateway implementation
steps.description: Implement mock gateway adapter that simulates success and failure.

tasks.title: Create mock gateway module (e.g. src/services/mock-payment-gateway.ts or adapter in payment.service)
tasks.description: Implement charge(amount, context): returns { success: boolean } or similar; configurable/deterministic failure (e.g. fail when amount mod 1000 === 0 or env-driven)

tasks.title: Ensure mock supports both success and failure scenarios for testing
tasks.description: Document or implement simple rule for when to fail (e.g. specific amount, flag, or random with seed)

steps.title: Step 3: Payment service and storage
steps.description: Implement payment creation and in-memory storage.

tasks.title: Create src/services/payment.service.ts with PaymentService class
tasks.description: In-memory Map for payments; create(bookingId, amount, status) returning Payment; getById; inject mock gateway

tasks.title: Implement createForBooking: call gateway, on success create payment (status paid) and return it, on failure throw
tasks.description: Orchestrate gateway charge + payment creation; throw on gateway failure so booking is not created

steps.title: Step 4: Extend Booking entity and BookingService
steps.description: Add paymentId and paymentStatus to Booking; integrate payment into booking creation flow.

tasks.title: Add paymentId and paymentStatus to Booking type in src/types/booking.ts
tasks.description: Both optional for backward compatibility if needed; for new bookings always set

tasks.title: Update BookingService.create: after capacity check, call PaymentService.createForBooking(activityId, amount, userId)
tasks.description: Compute amount = activity.price * participants; if payment throws, rethrow (no booking created)

tasks.title: On payment success, create booking with paymentId and paymentStatus, persist, return booking
tasks.description: Ensure booking creation and payment creation are consistent; no orphan payments

steps.title: Step 5: Routes and HTTP 402
steps.description: Update booking route to handle payment failure and return 402.

tasks.title: Wire PaymentService into booking route (instantiate, pass to BookingService or call from route)
tasks.description: Follow existing DI style (services instantiated in route file)

tasks.title: Catch payment-failure errors in POST /bookings handler; return HTTP 402 with error message
tasks.description: Do not create booking on payment failure; respond with clear message

tasks.title: Ensure 201 response includes booking with paymentId and paymentStatus
tasks.description: Response shape already returns booking; extend with new fields
